title: [Gameplay] Miss Fortune Bug, Arcade Miss Fortune Particles
body:
Me and My friends was just playing a blackmarket brawlers and after a while we found out that our Miss Fortune had Arcade Miss Fortune particles combined with her Classic particles.
Unfortunately, we don't have much information about the bug. This is just the information we got:
*It happend when a Arcade Miss Fortune and A Classic Miss Fortune was ingame (we had classic Miss Fortune in our team)
*It was on Blackmarket brawlers mode.
That's the only information we got.
Edit: I'm not sure If this is a known bug, but I didn't find anything, when I tried to search.

replies.body:
Morning hannayining! 

Thanks for the report, we'll take a look!

EDIT: Were you using any of the new items?

Yes, My friend used Trickter's glass and boots enchantment: Teleport.
EDIT: He also told me that (he think) he cloned as a champion who had Arcade Miss Fortune in front of the champion.
Thanks for the info! We're investigating now.
No problem! I'm glad that I could help ^^
